title: Ramp Generator Function Block
description: This function block implements a ramp generator that provides a variable output based on a specified time parameter and control signals. The ramp can be set, reset, and controlled to run in the upward or downward direction.
name: RMP_W

input.name: SET
input.description: Control signal to set the ramp output to its maximum value.

input.name: PT
input.description: Time duration for which the ramp should be executed.

input.name: E
input.description: Enable signal for the ramp operation; when false, the ramp is disabled.

input.name: UP
input.description: Direction control for the ramp; true for upward ramping, false for downward.

input.name: RST
input.description: Control signal to reset the ramp output to zero.

output.name: out
output.description: Current output value of the ramp generator.

output.name: busy
output.description: Indicates whether the ramp generator is currently active.

output.name: high
output.description: Indicates if the output is at its maximum value.

output.name: low
output.description: Indicates if the output is at its minimum value.
